scripts.prod: rm -rf ./.cache && rm -rf ./dist && npx parcel build src/index.html --out-dir D:\MyDevelopingApps\Php\php-get-remote-url-http-headers --no-source-maps
scripts.build: rm -rf ./.cache && rm -rf ./public && npx parcel build src/index.html --out-dir public --no-source-maps && yarn copy-files
